testcase.name: login
testcase.system-out: Browser Launcher :) Browser maximised Application launched Clicked on login button Email entered sucessfully Password entered sucessfully Clicked on login button Home page displayed Product name entered Clicked on search button Search result page displayed Clicked on particular product product details page displayed Clicked on add to product button Product added to cart Clicked on shopping cart link Shopping cart page displayed Added product displayed in cart Selected CountryID entered zippostalcode selected terms and conditions check box Clicked on checkout button Checkout page displayed Billing address page displayed clicked on continue button Shipping address page displayed clicked on continue button Shipping method page displayed Seleceted Shippingoption1 clicked on continue button payment method page displayed selected cash on delivery option clicked on continue button payment information page displayed clicked on continue button Confirm Order page displayed Billing and Shipping and Product, cost details ahould be display clicked on continue button Thank you page should be display Your order has been successfully processed! message should be display clicked on order details link Order information page should be display Billing and Shipping and Product,Price details should be display Window Closed
